queries.description: AWS DB Instance should have its storage encrypted by setting the parameter to 'true'. The storage_encrypted default value is 'false'.

files.expected_value: 'storage_encrypted' should be set to true

queries.description: SNS (Simple Notification Service) Topic should be encrypted

files.expected_value: SNS Topic should be encrypted

queries.query_name: Sensitive Port Is Exposed To Entire Network
queries.description: A sensitive port, such as port 23 or port 110, is open for the whole network in either TCP or UDP protocol

files.expected_value: SSH (TCP:22) should not be allowed
HTTPS (TCP:443) should not be allowed
HTTP (TCP:80) should not be allowed
HTTPS (TCP:443) should not be allowed
HTTP (TCP:80) should not be allowed

queries.description: Security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0:0 and/or ::/0

files.expected_value: One of 'ingress.cidr_blocks' not equal '0.0.0.0/0'
One of 'ingress.cidr_blocks' not equal '0.0.0.0/0'
One of 'ingress.cidr_blocks' not equal '0.0.0.0/0'
One of 'ingress.cidr_blocks' not equal '0.0.0.0/0'
One of 'ingress.cidr_blocks' not equal '0.0.0.0/0'

queries.description: AWS CloudFront distributions should have logging enabled to collect all viewer requests, which means the attribute 'logging_config' should be defined

files.expected_value: aws_cloudfront_distribution[wordpress].logging_config should be defined

queries.description: CloudFront Minimum Protocol version should be at least TLS 1.2

files.expected_value: resource.aws_cloudfront_distribution[wordpress].viewer_certificate.cloudfront_default_certificate' should be 'false'

queries.description: All AWS CloudFront distributions should be integrated with the Web Application Firewall (AWS WAF) service

files.expected_value: 'web_acl_id'  should exist

queries.description: Check if CloudWatch logging is disabled for Route53 hosted zones

files.expected_value: 'aws_route53_query_log' should be set for respective 'aws_route53_zone'

queries.description: ELB should have logging enabled to help on error investigation

files.expected_value: 'aws_elb[{{wordpress}}].access_logs' should be defined and not null

queries.description: The HTTP port is open to the internet in a Security Group

files.expected_value: aws_security_group.ingress shouldn't open the HTTP port (80)
aws_security_group.ingress shouldn't open the HTTP port (80)

queries.description: IAM Database Auth Enabled should be configured to true when using compatible engine and version

files.expected_value: 'iam_database_authentication_enabled' should be set to true

queries.description: Make sure the AWS RDS configuration has automatic backup configured. If the retention period is equal to 0 there is no backup

files.expected_value: 'backup_retention_period' should be defined, and bigger than '0'

queries.description: RDS does not have any kind of logger

files.expected_value: 'enabled_cloudwatch_logs_exports' should be defined

queries.description: Server Access Logging should be enabled on S3 Buckets so that all changes are logged and trackable

files.expected_value: 'logging' should be defined and not null

queries.description: S3 bucket should have versioning enabled

files.expected_value: 'versioning' should be true

queries.query_name: Security Group With Unrestricted Access To SSH
queries.description: 'SSH' (TCP:22) should not be public in AWS Security Group

files.expected_value: aws_security_group[web_server] 'SSH' (Port:22) should not be public

queries.description: Every VPC resource should have an associated Flow Log

files.expected_value: aws_vpc[main] should be the same as Flow Logs VPC id
files.actual_value: aws_vpc[main] is not the same as Flow Logs VPC id

queries.description: VPC Subnet should not assign public IP

files.expected_value: aws_subnet[public].map_public_ip_on_launch should be set to false or undefined

queries.description: VPC should have a Network Firewall associated

files.expected_value: aws_vpc[main] has an 'aws_networkfirewall_firewall' associated
files.actual_value: aws_vpc[main] does not have an 'aws_networkfirewall_firewall' associated

queries.description: CloudFront web distributions should use custom (and not default) SSL certificates. Custom SSL certificates allow only defined users to access content by using an alternate domain name instead of the default one.

files.expected_value: Attribute 'cloudfront_default_certificate' should be 'false' or not defined

queries.description: IAM Access Analyzer should be enabled and configured to continuously monitor resource permissions

files.expected_value: 'aws_accessanalyzer_analyzer' should be set

queries.description: AWS Shield Advanced should be used for Amazon Route 53 hosted zone, AWS Global Accelerator accelerator, Elastic IP Address, Elastic Load Balancing, and Amazon CloudFront Distribution to protect these resources against robust DDoS attacks

files.expected_value: aws_route53_zone has shield advanced associated
files.actual_value: aws_route53_zone does not have shield advanced associated

files.expected_value: aws_cloudfront_distribution has shield advanced associated
files.actual_value: aws_cloudfront_distribution does not have shield advanced associated

queries.description: AWS services resource tags are an essential part of managing components. As a best practice, the field 'tags' should have additional tags defined other than 'Name'

files.expected_value: aws_autoscaling_group[{{web_server}}].tags should be defined and not null
aws_cloudwatch_metric_alarm[{{ec2_cpu_alarm}}].tags should be defined and not null
aws_db_parameter_group[{{wordpress}}].tags should be defined and not null
aws_cloudwatch_metric_alarm[{{rds_cpu_alarm}}].tags should be defined and not null
aws_iam_instance_profile[{{wordpress}}].tags should be defined and not null

queries.description: It's considered a best practice for all rules in AWS Security Group to have a description

files.expected_value: aws_security_group[{{web_server}}].ingress description should be defined and not null
aws_security_group[{{rds}}].ingress description should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: aws_security_group[{{rds}}].ingress description is undefined or null

files.actual_value: aws_security_group[{{elb}}].ingress description is undefined or null

files.expected_value: aws_security_group[{{elb}}].egress description should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: aws_security_group[{{elb}}].egress description is undefined or null

files.expected_value: aws_security_group[{{rds}}].egress description should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: aws_security_group[{{rds}}].egress description is undefined or null

files.expected_value: aws_security_group[{{web_server}}].egress description should be defined and not null
files.actual_value: aws_security_group[{{web_server}}].egress description is undefined or null

files.expected_value: aws_security_group[{{web_server}}].ingress description should be defined and not null
